sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { UserCheck, Users, TrendingUp, DollarSign, Clock, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, BarChart3, Calendar, Download, Filter, Eye, MessageSquare } from 'lucide-react'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; const CustomerReporting: React.FC = () => { const [selectedCustomer, setSelectedCustomer] = useState('all'); const [selectedPeriod, setSelectedPeriod] = useState('month'); // Mock data for individual customer reporting const customerData = [ { id: 'CUST-001', name: 'Dr. Sarah Johnson', practice: 'Johnson Medical Group', specialty: 'Cardiology', claimsSubmitted: 1250, claimsPaid: 1180, totalRevenue: 450000, denialRate: 5.6, avgPaymentTime: 28, status: 'active', lastActivity: '2024-01-15' }, { id: 'CUST-002', name: 'Dr. Michael Chen', practice: 'Chen Family Practice', specialty: 'Primary Care', claimsSubmitted: 890, claimsPaid: 845, totalRevenue: 320000, denialRate: 5.1, avgPaymentTime: 32, status: 'active', lastActivity: '2024-01-14' }, { id: 'CUST-003', name: 'Dr. Lisa Rodriguez', practice: 'Rodriguez Pediatrics', specialty: 'Pediatrics', claimsSubmitted: 1560, claimsPaid: 1480, totalRevenue: 520000, denialRate: 5.1, avgPaymentTime: 25, status: 'active', lastActivity: '2024-01-13' }, { id: 'CUST-004', name: 'Dr. Robert Wilson', practice: 'Wilson Orthopedics', specialty: 'Orthopedics', claimsSubmitted: 2100, claimsPaid: 1995, totalRevenue: 780000, denialRate: 5.0, avgPaymentTime: 30, status: 'active', lastActivity: '2024-01-12' } ]; const customerPerformanceData = [ { month: 'Jan', avgClaims: 1200, avgRevenue: 450000, avgDenialRate: 5.2 }, { month: 'Feb', avgClaims: 1250, avgRevenue: 470000, avgDenialRate: 5.0 }, { month: 'Mar', avgClaims: 1300, avgRevenue: 490000, avgDenialRate: 4.8 }, { month: 'Apr', avgClaims: 1350, avgRevenue: 510000, avgDenialRate: 4.6 }, { month: 'May', avgClaims: 1400, avgRevenue: 530000, avgDenialRate: 4.4 }, { month: 'Jun', avgClaims: 1450, avgRevenue: 550000, avgDenialRate: 4.2 }, ]; const specialtyDistribution = [ { specialty: 'Primary Care', customers: 45, revenue: 1800000 }, { specialty: 'Cardiology', customers: 32, revenue: 2400000 }, { specialty: 'Orthopedics', customers: 28, revenue: 2200000 }, { specialty: 'Pediatrics', customers: 38, revenue: 1600000 }, { specialty: 'Other', customers: 67, revenue: 2000000 }, ]; const getStatusBadge = (status: string) => { const statusConfig = { active: { class: 'status-approved', icon: CheckCircle, text: 'Active' }, pending: { class: 'status-pending', icon: Clock, text: 'Pending' }, inactive: { class: 'status-denied', icon: AlertTriangle, text: 'Inactive' } }; const config = statusConfig[status as keyof typeof statusConfig]; const Icon = config.icon; return ( {config.text} ); }; return (
{/* Header */}

{/* Charts Grid */}
{/* Customer Performance Trends */}

Customer Performance Trends

{/* Specialty Distribution */}

Revenue by Specialty

`${specialty}: $${(revenue/1000000).toFixed(1)}M`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="revenue" > {specialtyDistribution.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{/* Top Performers */}

Top Performing Customers

{customerData.slice(0, 3).map((customer) => (

{customer.name}

{customer.practice} {customer.specialty}

${(customer.totalRevenue / 1000).toFixed(0)}K

{customer.claimsPaid} claims paid

))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* Customer Table */}

Customer Performance Details

{customerData.map((customer) => ( ))}
Customer Practice Specialty Claims Submitted Claims Paid Revenue Denial Rate Payment Time Status Actions
{customer.name} {customer.practice} {customer.specialty} {customer.claimsSubmitted.toLocaleString()} {customer.claimsPaid.toLocaleString()} ${(customer.totalRevenue / 1000).toFixed(0)}K {customer.denialRate}% {customer.avgPaymentTime} days {getStatusBadge(customer.status)}
); }; export default CustomerReporting;
